text: Nevzat Güzelırmak (1 January 1942 – 12 October 2020) was a Turkish football defender and later manager. He was capped 18 times for Turkey. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Turkish footballers Category:Göztepe S.K. footballers Category:Turkey international footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Turkish football managers Category:Antalyaspor managers Category:Göztepe managers Category:Boluspor managers Category:Denizlispor managers Category:Konyaspor managers Category:Bursaspor managers Category:Altay S.K. managers Category:Karşıyaka S.K. managers Category:Kayseri Erciyesspor managers Category:Sarıyer S.K. managers Category:Adana Demirspor managers
title: Nevzat Güzelırmak
